overview: "A Reflection of Self" is a film collaboration between Unlocked Films and World Muse. We believe film is a powerful medium for highlighting social justice issues and amplifying the voices of those most directly impacted by them. From an indigenous two-spirit poet to a trans olympic athlete, "A Reflection of Self" shares the voices, stories, artistry, and heart of LGBTQIA2S+ community members and explores what it truly means to be free.
title: A Reflection of Self
